title: Calculator
text: Basic calculators can do only addition, subtraction, multiplication and division mathematical calculations.

title: Todo List
text: List everything that you have to do, with the most important tasks at the top, and the least important tasks at the bottom.

title: Form Submission
text: This is the process of a user filling out a form and sending the information to a web server for processing.

title: Theme Switcher
text: This pattern shows how to create a switch for website that allows changing between light and dark themes.

title: Multi Theme Switcher
text: The Theme Selector connector module enables developers to easily incorporate dark and light theme.

title: Todo From Local Storage
text: List everything that you have to do, with the most important tasks at the top, and the least important tasks at the bottom.

title: Dynamic Countries Data
text: There are 250 countries, including 193 UN members and 2 observer states-Holy See and Palestine.
